document.full_text: tiger woods will miss next week's quail hollow tournament in north carolina with a minor knee injury but hopes to play again in a few weeks, the former world number one said on tuesday.
document.title: woods sidelined with knee injury suffered at masters
lines_and_colors: tiger woods will miss next week's quail hollow tournament in north carolina with a minor knee injury but hopes to play again in a few weeks, the former world number one said on tuesday.
